text: Black Narcissus is a 1947 British drama movie directed by Michael Powell and Emeric Pressburger and was based on the 1939 novel of the same name by Rumer Godden. It stars Deborah Kerr, Sabu, Kathleen Byron, David Farrar, Flora Robson, Jean Simmons, Jenny Laird, Judith Furse, Esmond Knight and was distributed by General Film Distributors. It won 2 Academy Awards in 1948. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Powell Category:Movies directed by Emeric Pressburger
title: Black Narcissus
